title: Pick
description: Kept secret, and over a year in planning, with hundreds of possible outcomes, ‘PICK’ will put you dead centre of a zombie apocalypse. Welcome to a whole new genre we like to call disturbia. ‘PICK’ - the terrifying new novel by Tim O’Rourke and Thomas O’Rourke. Coming Autumn 2013!
author: Tim O'Rourke
